footer.description: Sheep farming and eco-friendly meat production. From nature to your table — clean and healthy food.
footer.address: Baku, Nasimi dist., Miralı Qashqay str.

hero.title: From nature to your table: Clean and Healthy Food
hero.subtitle: Qarabağlılar Farm is a modern agricultural enterprise raising sheep in natural conditions and offering eco-friendly, high-quality meat products. Veterinary oversight and transparency are our core principles.

aboutPreview.title: About us
aboutPreview.lead: The natural choice for your health
aboutPreview.text: Qarabağlılar Farm is a modern agricultural enterprise engaged in sheep farming and eco-friendly meat production. Quality control, veterinary standards and sustainable development are our core values. From a family farm to a strategic agricultural brand — with transparency and professionalism.

values.title: Why Qarabağlılar Farm?
values.subtitle: Natural meat and quality — our guarantee for every product
values.naturalFeedDesc: Our animals are fed only with natural feed. We do not use artificial additives or hormones.
values.sanitaryDesc: Strict compliance with veterinary and sanitary standards. Full quality control.
values.breedingDesc: Raising selected breeds and developing breeding lines.
values.ecoDesc: Respect for nature. Products raised in an eco-friendly environment.

productsPreview.title: Our products
productsPreview.text: Selected sheep breeds and high-quality meat products. Natural taste, eco-friendly production and full quality control — our guarantee for every product.
productsPreview.cta: Contact us for orders and delivery.

ctaStrip.title: Order quality meat
ctaStrip.text: Our team is ready to advise you and take your order.

history.title: Company history
history.p1: Qarabağlılar Farm is a modern agricultural enterprise built on family farming traditions. We have come a long way from a small family farm to a structured agricultural company.
history.p2: Our activity is based on sheep farming. Raising healthy animals in natural conditions, feeding them with natural feed and full compliance with veterinary requirements are our core principles.
history.p3: The company positions itself not just as a farm, but as an agricultural brand with prospects for a wider market and export. We continue to grow through strategic thinking and professional management.

mission.title: Mission and vision
mission.subtitle: The values behind our work
mission.transparencyDesc: Open demonstration of animal welfare. We give our customers full confidence.
mission.qualityDesc: Regular veterinary monitoring and strict compliance with sanitary standards.
mission.sustainabilityDesc: Natural feeding and husbandry methods. Eco-friendly production.

registration.title: Official registration and oversight
registration.text: Qarabağlılar Farm operates in accordance with the law. Company registration, veterinary oversight and compliance with sanitary standards are our priorities. We provide our customers with official and transparent service.

conditions.title: Conditions and feeding
conditions.p1: Our animals are kept on natural pastures. Open space, clean air and natural light are essential for healthy development. No artificial environment or overcrowding.
conditions.p2: Feeding is based only on natural feed. Grass, fodder plants and quality feed additives. A balanced ration in line with veterinary recommendations.
conditions.p3: We pay constant attention to sanitation and cleanliness. This approach ensures both animal health and product quality.

process.title: Quality control process
process.subtitle: Quality and reliability at every step
process.feedDesc: Only natural, high-quality feed. No artificial additives or hormones.
process.veterinaryDesc: Regular veterinary examination and preventive measures. Full health monitoring.
process.sanitationDesc: Strict compliance with cleanliness and sanitary standards. Eco-friendly environment.
process.deliveryDesc: Delivery with quality preserved. Transparent and reliable logistics.

products.title: Our products
products.subtitle: Sheep breeds and meat products — quality and reliability

breeds.title: Sheep breeds
breeds.subtitle: Quality production based on selected breeds and breeding work
breeds.localDesc: Breeds adapted to the local climate, healthy and productive. Animals selected on the basis of family farming experience.
breeds.qualityBreedingDesc: Improving productivity and meat quality through breed selection and breeding. A strategic approach.

meat.title: Meat products
meat.subtitle: High-quality, eco-friendly lamb. Features:
meat.naturalTasteDesc: Natural feed and pasture raising give the meat a unique, clean taste. No artificial additives.
meat.ecoCleanDesc: Production in line with veterinary and sanitary standards. A reliable product.
meat.highQualityDesc: Selected breeds and a quality control process. Our guarantee for every product.

cta.title: Contact us for wholesale and retail orders
cta.text: Contact us for information and orders of our quality products.
